level.heading: Uniformity of interpretation.
level.text: In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-86
level.text: For history of Law 19-86, see notes under § 15-361.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 10 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act.
